channel.title: runout on Mining Geotechnics
channel.description: Recent content in runout on Mining Geotechnics

item.title: Probability of Failure and runout
item.description: Often Geotechnical Engineer use televiewer data to calculate probability of failure (POF) and runout distance from the potential failure. Inputs Televiewer data The application uses dip and dip direction of structure datasets. It can also utilise the spatial data for filtering purpose. An example of input data sheet can be as the image below: Slope configurations and material parameters Slope configurations and material parameters such as shear strengths of structure are critical information for the estimation of POF and runout distance.
